descriptionHtml:
Name: Conan the Companion
Version: 0.1
Date: 3/22/2012
Category: Standalone Follower
Author: Sibastion
Forum: Sibastion on Skyrim Nexus
Homepage: drunkenangel2012@yahoo.com

Description
===========
This is a Conan follower mod, it adds Conan the companion to the game and has .esm so no facial discoloration.
Conan will do all avalable idle animations when you dismiss him, and will stay wherever you dismiss him at and start doing animations,
he will stay and make himself at home where ever you want. Rerecuite him at any time.
He is fully lore friendly and can die, but he is marked unique. 

Location
=======
Conan is camped near the entrance to Riverwood. 

Details
=======
Adds Conan the companion as a follower
Build your friendship with him
Must add the \"Atlantean Sword\" yourself sorry and there is plenty of mods for the original Conan gear out there if you want to download.
Conan is camping just outside of Riverwood.

Recommended mods for him to look like Conan: Better Males and Faces, Conan swords or another, or Conan gear, if you want to change his outfit you must do this in the CK.

Install
=======
1. Extract the files to a temporary location.
2. Examine the folder structure and make corrections where necessary.
3. Copy files to \\Skyrim\\Data\\ or steam
4. Start Skyrim Launcher, click \'Data Files\', place a checkmark beside the .esp  and the .esm file. Although it will brobly be checked already.

Uninstall
=========
1. Uncheck and delete
2. Or use Nexusmodmanager


Incompatibility
===============
None.

Known Issues or Bugs
====================
None as of yet

History
=======


Contact
=======
Please let me know of any bugs and stuff , this is not my first mod but the first one I\'ve uploaded. So I need some feedback so I know if I did it right, thanks?
Sibastion on Skyrimnexus or drunkenangel2012@yahoo.com

Credits
=======
Thanks to Bethesda for creating Skyrim.
Thanks to Skyrim Nexus for the resources for this cool site
Thanks to Conan

Tools Used
==========
Skyrim Creation Kit

Licensing/Legal
===============
Do what ever the hell you want to this mod, Sibastion
author: Sibastion
